metadata.synopsis: Edgecase for if you don't speak to the victim and he has to die. You're about to puke your guts up after being de-petrified

0.speaker: Efrin
0.text: The Bite! No. I don't want to die. I don't - Argh.
0.context: NodeContext: You're about to puke your guts up and die a horrible death. You feel it coming - you're panicked, scared and terrified.
